role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update almn_user set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enjoy_user = #{enjoyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enjoy_tag = #{enjoyTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_passwd = #{userPasswd,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_icon = #{userIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_realname = #{userRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_idCard = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_mail = #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, favor_cnt = #{favorCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coin_cnt = #{coinCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coin_num = #{coinNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, praise_cnt = #{praiseCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, negative_cnt = #{negativeCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avg_cnt = #{avgCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, effect_cnt = #{effectCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, personal_honor = #{personalHonor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_last_time = #{userLastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deltime = #{deltime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from almn_user order by effect_cnt desc
mapper.update: update almn_user a INNER JOIN (select u.user_id, u.favor_cnt * w1.effect_val as sum_favor_cnt, u.coin_cnt * w2.effect_val as sum_coin_cnt, u.praise_cnt * w3.effect_val as sum_praise_cnt, u.negative_cnt * w4.effect_val as sum_negative_cnt, u.avg_cnt * w5.effect_val as sum_avg_cnt, u.favor_cnt * w1.effect_val + u.coin_cnt * w2.effect_val + u.praise_cnt * w3.effect_val + u.negative_cnt * w4.effect_val + u.avg_cnt * w5.effect_val as sum_effect from almn_user u INNER JOIN (SELECT * from almn_effect_set a where a.effect_key = 'favor_val') w1 INNER JOIN (SELECT * from almn_effect_set a where a.effect_key = 'coin_val') w2 INNER JOIN (SELECT * from almn_effect_set a where a.effect_key = 'praise_val') w3 INNER JOIN (SELECT * from almn_effect_set a where a.effect_key = 'negative_val') w4 INNER JOIN (SELECT * from almn_effect_set a where a.effect_key = 'avg_val') w5) t on a.user_id = t.user_id set a.effect_cnt = t.sum_effect
